balance.paypal_error: There was an error while processing your payment. Please contact the support.

costs.settlement: The account balance of #name# will be set to € 0.00 Do you want to continue?
costs.settlementMessage: Are you sure you want to settle account of #name# and cancel all future meals?
costs.success: The account settlement of #name# was successful.
costs.settlementNotPossible: The account can't be settled, either because it was already settled or because an error occured.

combiModal.title: Choose a combination for your combined dish

dashboard.popover: Someone else can take your meal now.

debt.text: I know that my account balance is #balance# in the red and will pay my debt very soon.

popover.oneSizeServing: This dish has only one serving size

error.101: The data sent did not meet the requirements. Therefore the request could not be processed.
error.102: The week cannot be created because it already exists. If the problem persists, contact support.
error.103: The week cannot be created because it already exists. If the problem persists, contact support.
error.104: The week cannot be created due to an unknown error. If the problem persists, contact support.
error.105: A tag of the menu for which meals have been edited does not appear to exist. If the problem persists, contact support.
error.106: An attempt was made to enter more than the maximum 2 meals allowed (for one day). The request was canceled.
error.107: The menu seems to contain unknown dishes. The request was canceled.
error.108: The meal cannot be changed because it already has participations.
error.201: Information is still missing to be able to create the dish.
error.202: One or more titles for the dish being created appear to be missing.
error.203: There was an error when counting how often individual dishes were ordered.
error.301: The selected titles for the category are missing or already exist.
error.401: To add a user to a combined meal, two dishes must be selected.
error.402: Something went wrong while booking the meal
error.403: The meal can't be booked, because the maximum number of this meal has already been booked.
error.501: The profile to be hidden is already hidden.
error.502: The request to balance this user's account has already been sent.
error.504: The profile for the settlement request could not be found.
error.505: The settlement request has either already been processed or the request is invalid.
error.601: The amount to add to the account must be more than 0.
error.801: No permission to enter or leave the event
error.903: You are already registered. If you have any questions please message your contact person.

costs.settlementSent: The request to settle the users balance was successfully sent.
costs.cashPayment: Added a cash payment to the balance.

finance.empty: There are no transactions for the selected timeframe

participations.added: A user was successfully added a meal.
participations.removed: A user was succefully removed fromm a meal.

guest.joined: We are looking forward to meeting you.

print.error: An error occured during the creation of the pdf.

guest.title: Lunch at AOE
guest.description:
As our guest, we would like to invite you to lunch in the AOE Eatery. To order a meal, register no later than one day before your visit to AOE with your personal information and choose the desired dish. Your order will be forwarded to our cooks.

We hope that you enjoy your lunch
AOE

event.title: Event at AOE
event.description:
We would like to invite you to join us at the Event "%EventTitle%". To ensure we can plan ahead with you, please register for the event by %lockDate% at the latest.

We look forward to having you!

menu.notFound: No profiles found for this query

session.timeout_text: The page has to be reloaded in order to restore the session.
